patthana11.8:4.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.8:5.3: Hetuyā catuvīsa … pe … āsevane sattarasa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate catuvīsa.
patthana11.8:6.3: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.8:7.1: Nakusalaṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana11.8:7.5: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.8:9.1: Nakusalaṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana11.8:10.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.8:11.1: Nakusalaṃ naanuppannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ nauppādiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana11.8:12.1: Nakusalaṃ naatītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ naanāgataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana11.8:13.1: Nakusalaṃ naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana11.8:14.1: Nakusalaṃ naajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ nabahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana11.8:15.1: Nakusalaṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe … nakusalaṃ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana11.8:16.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
